entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Context Prematurely Disposed While In Scope #27246
  • Delete and add an object with child object, the child object will double #27245
  • Support for Azure AD RBAC when using Cosmos DB #27244
  • SQLitePCLRaw.provider.e_sqlite3: Unable to load shared library 'e_sqlite3' or one of its dependencies. #27243
  • check keyless entity for null server side evaluation #27242
  • EF Core 6 - Sql server int to BIT mapping not allowed #27240
  • TemporalAll() in Temporal Tables with child entity gives System.InvalidOperationException when used with Include() #27237

Closed

  • Add overload `EnableRetryOnFailure` that allows specifying `errorCodesToAdd` without count / delay #27074
    7.0.0
  • Investigate timeouts on Mac builds #25811
  • Look into using the new Microsoft.Extensions.Logging compile-time source generator #24988
  • OData/Test: reuse OnModelCreating infra from the regular tests in our OData tests #22520
  • Test: Create a TestBase which allows inserting custom model to run queries #17588
    6.0.0
  • Cleanup: Consider unifying sync and async code paths #10902
  • Verify actual expression not translated for SimpleQuerySqliteTest #17265
  • Test: Verify exception message for client eval case #17328
  • Apply FirstOrDefault() before Select() in Entity Framework #27211
  • EF Core 5 on Unity 2021.2 #27241
  • Collection Navigation Property is not Loading #27226
  • EF Core 6 - IsTemporal adds an unnecessary migration when DefaultSchema is configured at the DbContext Level #26676

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/6.0] Update build and test machines #27238
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode
  • [release/5.0] Stop building w/ VS2017 in CI #27236
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode
  • [release/3.1] Stop building w/ VS2017 in CI #27235
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode
  • Update branding to preview2 #27234

Merged

  • Add overload to SqlServerDbContextOptionsBuilder.EnableRetryOnFailure with errorNumbersToAdd without forcing maxRetryCount and maxRetryDelay #27135
    community-contribution
  • [main] Update build and test machines #27239
    area-infrastructure
  • Fix to #26676 - EF Core 6 - IsTemporal adds an unnecessary migration when DefaultSchema is configured at the DbContext Level #27198
  • Update branding to preview1 #27232

Updated

  • Bump SQLitePCLRaw to 2.0.8-pre20220111224339 #27191
  • Add support for index sort order (descending) #27210
  • [release/2.1] Stop building w/ VS2017 in CI #27233
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode
  • [release/2.1] Move off expiring machine pools #26794
    area-infrastructure
